entry.title: Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Gift Card
Price: 25.00 - 125.00 (5 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a The Missing Piece Puzzle Company gift card.

Gift cards are delivered via email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

Gift cards will expire one year from purchase date, but who can wait that long to have a custom puzzle made?  I can't think of anyone, either!

Let's get your puzzle on....

entry.title: Pink Puzzle Piece Bracelet. Several designs to choose from. Friendship bracelet.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 9.99

Our beautiful pink bracelets are adjustable to fit most wrist sizes.  Featuring our signature puzzle piece, this pink bracelet is a great and inexpensive addition to your puzzle collection.  This makes a great gift for the puzzler in your life.  

Each bracelet is made of wax cord and features pieces that are braided within the design.  The clasp is a lobster clasp and will keep your bracelet secure.  All metal pieces are silver in color.

Choose from a few designs.  These bracelets are a limited edition in our shop and when they are gone, they are gone forever.

entry.title: Gender Reveal Unique Idea Jigsaw Puzzle - It's A Boy or It's A Girl Jigsaw Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 19.99

Unique Gender Reveal Puzzle. 

Reveal your baby's gender with a jigsaw puzzle that is completely framable when complete.  Choose either 30 or 60 pieces and Girl or Boy.  We will keep your surprise by placing a question mark on the lid so that the puzzle will reveal the answer.  Fun, fast and very inexpensive! 

The Puzzle will have an approximate finished size of 8x10 inches when it is complete.  Frame it and place it in the nursery for memories that will last a lifetime.  A wonderful and very unique and fun way to announce your baby's gender.

Ready to ship item﻿﻿﻿.

entry.title: Black Autism Awareness Jigsaw Puzzle Ribbon Scarf
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 14.99

Our beautiful handmade and hand-cut Puzzle Pattern scarf features anti-pill fleece with an autism awareness puzzle ribbon that makes you smile.  Frequently used for Autism Awareness, this pattern is hard to find a pattern that matches almost every outfit.  Show your support while looking stylish.  Handmade in our shop, order soon as there is a limited supply, a simple design, and not sewn.  

These scarves are hand-cut in our store and are approximately 58 inches long and 8-10 inches wide.  Made of 100% polyester, it is recommended that you:

  • Machine Wash Cold, Delicate Cycle, No Chlorine Bleach, Tumble Dry Low, Remove Promptly
Each scarf will vary slightly as each is hand cut.  The material is an anti-pill fleece material that will keep you warm while looking very stylish.  This product is not sewn, is cut by hand, and is unique.

entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:

Our handpainted Autism Awareness Wine Glass is made in our shop.  This glass features a very large set of puzzle pieces with blue, yellow, green and red, which are the autism awareness colors.  This is a very large wine glass which makes the phrase "I'm only having one glass" a little easier to handle.

The glass measures approximately 8.5 inches high and approximately 4 inches wide, which is a very large glass.  Featuring hand painted puzzle pieces in colors representative of autism awareness, this one is FUN.

ONE OF A KIND, so get it now before it's gone forever!

Type:
Price: 9.99

Fun Socks! Get your jigsaw puzzle socks on and have some fun making a statement with your unique fashion.

This listing is for ONE (1) pair of ladies funny socks in a jigsaw puzzle pattern that fits ladies size 9-11. Made of durable nylon, these socks are uniquely US.

Fun, fashionable, and inexpensive.

These socks are a novelty and should be cared for as such. We suggest turning the socks inside-out, using cold water wash, and a low heat dry for longer lasting color.

entry.title: Coloring Book Puzzle with Inspirational Quote. Paint Party Alternate Idea 8x10 inches
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 19.99

Our unique Paint party idea has everyone talking.  Our coloring book puzzle is inspirational and fun.  First, assemble the puzzle and then paint, or paint then assemble.  Completely your choice.  Fun time with friends over a glass of your favorite libation, 

Our 8x10 inch puzzle features 30 pieces for a wonderful time. (Photo is of our larger size 16x20 inch puzzle found here ).  I choose to be happy...

Choose happiness and brighten your day and throw the perfect Paint Party.  Why paint on canvas when you can color on a matte finish paper, assemble the jigsaw puzzle, then keep the keepsake!  Easily fits into a frame.

Contact us for other inspirational designs!

Autism Awareness Jigsaw Puzzle Pattern colorful headband. This colorful bright headband not only holds your hair back in style but shows your awareness for autism. Each headband is handmade by me in my home with the "help" of my son who suffers from autism. He's my world...  Made with Elastic, this puzzle print is very symbolic.

This listing is for three (3) headbands because 2 just aren't enough! You can order multiple packs for your family and friends for a perfect outing.
